channel.title: Surrey|Greater Vancouver Regional District|British Columbia|Canada on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Surrey|Greater Vancouver Regional District|British Columbia|Canada on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 58
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 58 - 200 St./Langley City Center./Golden Ears (Toll) Bridge. Continue east on TC-1 for Hope.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 57
item.description: TC-1 East approaching Exit 57 - 192 St (North)/Golden Ears (Toll) Bridge.

item.title: End BC-17 East at TC-1 and BC-15
item.description: End BC-17 East at TC-1 and BC-15 in Surrey. Merge right for TC-1 East to Langley and Hope. Roadway becomes BC-15 South/176 St.

item.title: BC-17 East approaching TC-1
item.description: BC-17 East approaching TC-1 to Hope and Vancouver.

item.title: BC-17 East - 104 Ave
item.description: BC-17 East (South Fraser Perimeter Road) at 104 Ave. Continue east on BC-17 for BC-15 South to USA Border, TC-1 East to Hope, Langley, and Coquitlam.

item.title: Bridgeview Road north at BC-17
item.description: Bridgeview Road north at BC-17 in Surrey. Turn right for BC-17 East to TC-1 and Hope. Turn left for BC-17 West to Delta. Continue north on Bridgeview Road for 116 Ave.

item.title: King George Blvd. South at BC-17
item.description: King George Blvd. South at BC-17. Merge right for BC-17 west and Scott Road. Continue straight for King George Blvd. South to Surrey City Center, Langley, and BC-17 East.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 16
item.description: BC-99 North approaching Exit 16. Use Exit 16 for access to TC-1 East to Hope.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 16
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 16 - BC-91 North/North Delta/New Westminster.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 10
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 10 - King George Blvd/Surrey City Center. Speed Limit - 100 km/h.

item.title: BC-99 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-99 north. Distance to (Tsawwassen) Ferries - 38km; distance to Vancouver - 50km.

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 2
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 2 - 8th Ave./White Rock/To TC-1. Continue north on BC-99 to Vancouver.

item.title: BC-99 North - Entering Surrey
item.description: Entering Surrey on BC-99 North. Use next 3 exits on BC-99 for Surrey.

item.title: BC-99 North - Welcome to British Columbia
item.description: Welcome to British Columbia on BC-99 north. Taken just north of Canada Customs.

item.title: BC-99 North - Think Metric
item.description: BC-99 North at US/Canada border. Think metric - 30 km/h was 20 MPH. A smaller sign below that instructs Nexus traffic to keep right.
